strapiPost.title: Join The Square 2 Square Bike Ride This Weekend
strapiPost.content:
Cyclists from across NW Arkansas will celebrate cycling, promote safe riding, and enjoy the amazing Razorback Greenway this Saturday in the Square 2 Square Bicycle Ride.

  • Go greenway: Riders will meet at Lawrence Plaza in Bentonville on Saturday morning, then make the 30 mi. journey down the Razorback Greenway to Walker Park in Fayetteville. 
  • Join the ride: Register to ride solo, with a group, or join the virtual option! The registration fee includes a goody bag, t-shirt, and finisher medal. Tickets for a shuttle service from Walker Park to Bentonville are available for those wanting to park a vehicle at the end of the ride.

Register to ride by Oct 5th HERE.
